metadata.feature_description: Enables uploading of images, documents, and generic files with multipart support and automatic path generation.

steps.action: Navigate to Assets > My Website and click Add Asset
steps.expected: Upload dialog should appear with drag-and-drop area
steps.actual: Upload dialog appeared with 'Drag and Drop a File or Select an Option' text and File button
File was uploaded and duplicate detection triggered (file already existed). After clicking Replace, file showed 'File uploaded' with checkmark

steps.action: Select three files (multi_upload_A.png, multi_upload_B.png, multi_upload_C.png) for upload
steps.expected: All three files should upload successfully
steps.actual: All three files uploaded successfully with 'File uploaded' status and checkmarks displayed for each

steps.expected: Document should upload successfully with appropriate icon
steps.actual: Document uploaded successfully with TXT icon displayed and 'File uploaded' status

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Upload file with special characters in name

steps.expected: File with special characters should upload successfully
steps.actual: File uploaded successfully. System handled special characters (@#$%) in filename correctly

steps.expected: Upload should be rejected with size limit error
steps.actual: Upload was rejected with error message 'File size bigger than 28. Mb' and red X indicator

steps.expected: Upload should be rejected due to blocked file extension
steps.actual: Upload was rejected with error message 'File extension not allowed.' and red X indicator

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Upload file with duplicate name - Replace option

steps.action: Upload file that already exists in folder
steps.expected: System should detect duplicate and offer Keep/Replace options
steps.actual: Dialog appeared showing 'The file you want to upload already exists in this folder.' with Keep and Replace links

steps.expected: Existing file should be replaced with new upload
steps.actual: File was replaced successfully, showing 'File uploaded' status

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Upload file with duplicate name - Keep option

steps.action: Upload duplicate file and click Keep option
steps.expected: Upload should be cancelled and existing file kept
steps.actual: Upload was cancelled with 'File upload stopped' message, existing file preserved

steps.action: Enable 'Decompress Zip Files' toggle and upload test_archive.zip
steps.expected: Zip file should be uploaded and automatically extracted
steps.actual: Zip file uploaded and 'Unzip Information' dialog displayed showing '1 of 1 file(s) were extracted successfully.'
Search returned test_document.docx file matching the search query

observations: The upload system uses anti-forgery token validation via [IFrameSupportedValidateAntiForgeryToken] attribute as seen in FileUploadController.cs
File size limit is configured at 28 MB for this portal
Executable files (.exe) are blocked by default for security
The system supports multipart file uploads for images, documents, and generic files
Drag-and-drop upload zone is present in the UI with clear visual indicator
The Decompress Zip Files toggle allows automatic extraction of uploaded zip archives
